document.full_text: the united states women's national team will play its final match before departing for europe and the world cup against mexico at red bulls arena in harrison, n.j., on june 5.
document.title: sports briefing | soccer: red bull arena hosts u.s. team
lines_and_colors: the united states women's national team will play its final match before departing for europe and the world cup against mexico at red bulls arena in harrison, n.j., on june 5.
